programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Adrift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E01, When Atlantis starts shutting down due to a damaged power system, Rodney McKay turns off all non-essential systems. But in just 28 hours, McKay realizes the city’s shields may fail completely and its inhabitants will succumb the vacuum of space.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E02, Lt. Col. Sheppard leads a daring raid to secure a ZPM that will save Atlantis. When the Replicators become aware of the incursion into their city, Sheppard’s team must keep them at bay or else abandon the mission and their hope of saving Atlantis.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E03, Ronon reconnects with a group of Satedans from his past who enlist the Atlantis team's help on a dangerous mission against the Wraith. But after the Atlantis crew is captured, Ronon is faced with the truth about his old friends’ new loyalties.

programme.title: Doppelganger
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E04, During an exploratory walk on a jungle planet, Sheppard touches a glowing crystalline growth and becomes host to an infectious energy form. Once on Atlantis, the entity begins to move from person to person, putting the entire crew at risk.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E05, On his way back to Atlantis, Lt. Col. Sheppard is taken prisoner by a rogue ship helmed by a ruthless human commander with a secret agenda. As the team searches for him, Sheppard's resourcefulness is put to the test as he tries to stay alive.

programme.title: Subversion
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E18, After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctor’s switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E19, When Col. Telford reveals the Destiny is in imminent danger of being boarded by the Lucian Alliance, they launch an attack on the Lucian Alliance’s secret base. Meanwhile, the Lucian Alliance forces Dr. Rush to help stage an assault on the Destiny.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E20, The Destiny crew must fight for their lives when members of the Lucian Alliance come through the Stargate, hell-bent on taking the ship by force. Meanwhile, the Destiny starts having ship-wide power blackouts caused by deadly bursts of radiation.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E01, After Colonel Young and his military personnel are captured by the Lucian Alliance, Dannic abandons them on a nearby planet. Meanwhile on the ship, Dr. Rush, Brody, Chloe, and Eli attempt a risky plan to force the Lucians to surrender.

programme.title: Space Race
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E08, The Serakkin Warrick proposes to share his planet's technology with Earth in exchange for Carter helping him win a space race. Carter eagerly agrees and copilots the craft through a perilous obstacle course; but the race isn't without risks.

programme.title: Avenger 2.0
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E09, Dr. Felger creates a computer virus meant to disable Goa'uld-controlled worlds. When the program malfunctions and spreads throughout the Stargate network, O'Neill, Teal'c and Daniel are trapped off-world, with danger looming around the corner.

programme.title: Birthright
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E10, SG-1 encounters a race of women warriors whose survival depends on symbiotes harvested from Jaffa. Teal'c and SG-1 must convince the warriors' high priestess to put aside her fear of reliance on a life-saving drug before the Goa'uld destroy them.

programme.title: Evolution (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E11, SG-1 encounters a very advanced bio-engineered warrior endowed with super strength, created by Anubis. While the team sets out to locate the origin of this new foe, Daniel travels to South America in search of a device left on Earth by the Ancients.

programme.title: Evolution (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E12, Having found the location of the warrior base, Carter is assigned a recon mission to determine Anubis's plans. Meanwhile, O'Neill mounts a mission to South America to rescue Daniel who has been kidnapped by Honduran rebels demanding a ransom.

programme.title: Grace
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E13, Having sustained an injury during an alien attack, Carter awakens to find herself abandoned on the Prometheus and trapped. With only her subconscious as a guide, Carter must find a way out of the nebula before it destroys the ship and her way home.

programme.title: Fallout
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E14, Jonas Quinn returns to the SGC with news that Naquadria mines of Kelowna are not native to his world and are threatening to cause an explosion in the planet's core that will leave his home world uninhabitable and millions dead.

programme.title: Chimera
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E15, Daniel experiences strange dreams centered around his possible knowledge of the Lost City of the Ancients. Suspicious that Daniel's mind is being manipulated, the team must find a way to help him while keeping the secret from the Goa'uld.

programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E20, After Manny suffers a life-altering injury during a rescue, April tries to save him from himself. Neely meets her match in Alex when she tries to discredit Mitch.

programme.title: Galaxy Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E21, April and Jessie search for the perfect celebrity host for a seaside beauty contest. Mitch and Alex help Manny adjust to his paralysis.

programme.title: Castles in the Sand
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E22, Alex's search for the creator of several elaborate sandcastles is interrupted when she gets stuck entertaining her best friend's fiancée, who falls madly for Mitch. Cody loses his cool when his new boat is stolen while he's scuba diving with Newmie.

programme.title: Aloha Baywatch
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E01, Mitch envisions an International "Top Gun" style lifeguard school in Hawaii. He invites Sean Monroe to lead the new team, which will include a variety of highly-rated lifeguards from beaches around the world.

programme.title: Mahalo Hawaii
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E02, Amidst the chaos, the new Baywatch Hawaii team must learn to work and live together. Jason meets a man with a mysterious past. A girl Mitch saved suffers from secondary drowning, leading to a critical test of the new recruits.

programme.title: Weak Link
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E03, Tanner visits Mitch, tours the Islands, and befriends a dying girl. After failing her initial "test", Dawn challenges Sean to a dangerous contest with her future at Baywatch hanging in the balance. JD competes to join the America's Cup Sailing Team.

programme.title: Shark Island
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E04, Tanner believes The Shark Island Legend. Mitch doesn't. Team Baywatch competes with the Coast Guard. Jessie and Kekoa both dump JD. Swimming naked in a Hawaiian purification ritual, Jesse has to make a rescue in the nude.

programme.title: Strike Team
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E05, Sean leads Team Baywatch on a daring night rescue in shark-infested waters to save 6 kayaking teens stranded off the perilous Na Pali coast.

programme.title: Sunday in Kauai
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E06, Jessie and Kekoa battle each other even as they rescue a man stranded behind a waterfall! Sean and Allie search for treasure. JD and Jason help two girls save a cat caught on a boat mast, but wind up catapulting it across the water!

programme.title: Risk to Death
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E07, Sean threatens to kick Jason off the team after Jason defies his orders and makes a daring rescue. Allie, Dawn, and Nick have to save a drowning man and his pregnant wife about to give birth in the ocean.

programme.title: Father of the Groom
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E08, Sean is faced with a life-or-death decision during a daring cave rescue in which Kekoa faces her greatest fear. Hobie plans to get married, but Mitch is at odds with his fiancée’s obnoxious parents.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E09, The Team hunts men mutilating sharks for their fins. Jason, who's always feared sharks, learns to accept the local tradition that sharks are sacred protectors of the Hawaiian Islands.

programme.title: Gold from the Deep
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E10, Allie discovers a rare Hawaiian coin from a ship that sank after the Pearl Harbor attack. Sean lets the team dive for sunken treasure provided it doubles as a training exercise. The deep-sea dive leads to discord, dissent, and explosive danger.

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E11, Allie is terrified she may lose the love of her life when Nick gets the bends in a daring attempt to rescue a mini-sub on the ocean floor.
